definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: I appreciate your invitation, but I have to take a rain check.
sentences.chinese: 你的邀请我心领了，感谢盛意改日一定践约。

sentences.english: Due to an unexpected situation, our plan will be put into cold storage until further notice.
sentences.chinese: 由于意外情况，我们的计画陷于停顿，改日另行通知。

sentences.english: Thanks for the invitation , but i will have to take a rain-check on it .
sentences.chinese: 你的邀请我心领了，感谢盛意改日一定践约。

sentences.english: The shop assistant suggested that Jack (should) come another day.
sentences.chinese: 店员向杰克建议他改日再来。

sentences.english: Maybe I'm just a man sings on minor.
sentences.chinese: 于是我想，还是改日重聘女声主唱吧。

sentences.english: Mr. Li is out, please come another day.
sentences.chinese: 李先生外出了，请改日再来。

sentences.english: Thanks for the invitation, but I'll have to take a rain-check on it.
sentences.chinese: 你的邀请我心领了，感谢盛意改日一定践约。

sentences.english: You can take that step today if you choose to, or you can put it off until another day.
sentences.chinese: 你可以选择今天开始，或者推迟改日。

sentences.english: The shop is closed today so we'll come another day.
sentences.chinese: 商店今天关门，所以我们改日再来。

sentences.english: If you are busy，you may come another day instead.
sentences.chinese: 要是你忙的话，就改日再来吧。

sentences.english: It you are busy , we may come another day instead.
sentences.chinese: 要是你忙的话，我们就改日再来。

sentences.english: He suggested doing the experiment in another day.
sentences.chinese: 他建议改日再做这个实验。

sentences.english: Lets leave that for another day.
sentences.chinese: 让我们把那件事留到改日再做。

sentences.english: Thank you for your inviting, and I will go to visit you another day.
sentences.chinese: 你的邀请我心领了，感谢盛意改日一定践约。

sentences.english: No thanks, but maybe another time.

definition: another day/some other time/to find another day (for appointment etc)/to take a rain check
in a moment/later/also pr. [dai1 hui3 r5] or [dai1 hui5 r5]
to inconvenience/to trouble (sb with a request)
goodbye (modest formula)/Excuse me, I must leave.
deference is no substitute for obedience (idiom)/(said to accept sb's request, invitation etc)
pinyin: gong1 jing4 bu4 ru2 cong2 ming4

definition: future days/(literary) the next day/(old) past days
to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/vexation/inconvenience
Please do as you wish!/You are welcome to do whatever you like!/Please make yourself at home.
